latest_revision.text: When Tapping you must drill a hole smaller than the final hole, typically with a numbered, not a standard sized, drill bit.  To find this bit this you would use a [http://bobmay.astronomy.net/misc/drillchart.htm Size Chart].  For metric theres a nice trick: You take your final size and subtract the pitch.  Most of the time metric is standard pitched so you can use a [http://www.zerofast.com/threadm.htm Metric Thread Chart] to look that up.  Ex: M6, standard is 1.0, use an M5 to drill your hole
